tenant_ids.title: Tenant IDs
tenant_ids.description: Comma separated list of Tenant IDs of tenants to download the data from. Leave empty to download all available. Data will be merged from all provided tenants.

endpoints.title: Endpoints
endpoints.description: Endpoints to download from the Xero Accounting API.

modified_since.title: Modified since
modified_since.description: YYYY-MM-DD formatted date or relative string supported by date parser, e.g. "5 days ago", used to filter results if available for given endpoint.

load_type.title: Load Type
load_type.description: If Full load is used, the destination table will be overwritten every run. If incremental load is used, data will be upserted into the destination table. Tables with a primary key will have rows updated, tables without a primary key will have rows appended.
